adept.kbapi

Class KBRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.kbapi.KBPredicateArgument
      • adept.kbapi.KBRelation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KBEvent, KBMentalState, KBTemporalSpan

    public class KBRelation
extends KBPredicateArgument
    The Class KBRelation represents a fully loaded, immutable relation.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public static KBRelation.InsertionBuilder relationInsertionBuilder(adept.common.OntType relationType,
                                                                   float confidence)

        Parameters:

        confidence -
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        confidence -
        Returns:

      • relationInsertionBuilder

        public static KBRelation.InsertionBuilder relationInsertionBuilder(adept.common.DocumentRelation documentRelation,
                                                                   Map<adept.common.Item,KBPredicateArgument> insertedArgumentMap,
                                                                   KBOntologyMap ontologyMap)
        Create a new InsertionBuilder for insertion into the KB. This method prepopulates an InsertionBuilder with the content of a DocumentRelation. All argument targets of the DocumentRelation must have been inserted into the KB already, and they must be mapped from an Item to a KBPredicateArgument in the insertedArgumentMap. All provenances on both the DocumentRelation and DocumentRelationArguments will be added to the builder. The ontologyMap will be used to convert Types and Roles from the DocumentRelation into the ontology of the KB. An exception will be thrown if the types cannot be mapped.
        Parameters:
        documentRelation -
        insertedArgumentMap -
        ontologyMap -
        Returns:

      • relationInsertionBuilder

        protected static void relationInsertionBuilder(KBRelation.AbstractInsertionBuilder<?,?> builder,
                                               adept.common.DocumentRelation documentRelation,
                                               Map<adept.common.Item,KBPredicateArgument> insertedArgumentMap,
                                               KBOntologyMap ontologyMap)

      • updateBuilder

        public KBRelation.AbstractUpdateBuilder<?,?> updateBuilder()
        Create a new UpdateBuilder based on this object. Only confidences and provenances can be updated after a KBRelation is saved. Note that KBRelation.AbstractUpdateBuilder.update(KB) returns a NEW KBrelation object, and this one will no longer be valid.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        adept.kbapi.model.KBPredicateArgument#updateBuilder()
